Worcester.George Gale House (Worcester, Massachuse: The George Gale House is a historic house at 15 Elizabeth Street in Worcester, Massachusetts. The 2 1/2 story wood frame house was built 1848-49 by Joel Flagg, who occupied until his death in 1854. The house is an excellent modest side-hall plan Greek Revival structure, with a columned porch wrapping around two sides, and a pedimented gable end.
